{/* Content Section */}

Hello, I'm {personalInfo.name}

I'm a passionate 4th year Computer Science Engineering student at Saraswati Higher Education College. My journey in technology is driven by curiosity and love for creating digital solutions.

I completed a 60-day MERN Stack internship at Softpro and received an A+ grade for my performance. This gave me hands-on experience in real-world web development.

With excellent communication skills and quick learning ability, I adapt easily to new technologies and enjoy team collaborations.

Beyond Academics

When I'm not coding, you'll find me participating in college tech events, collaborating with peers on projects, or exploring new technologies. I believe in maintaining a balance between academic learning and practical application.
